version_description:
◆ WebDAV cloud sync (NAS, ownCloud, ...)
◆ New versioning scheme: YY.R.B (Year.Release.Build)
◆ Bug fixes
◆ Bug fix for Touch ID login
◆ Dropbox sync bug fix

◆ History for password and PIN fields
◆ Updated Google Drive sync API
◆ Bug fixes

◆ Multitasking support on iPad (Split View mode)
◆ Dynamic Type support (phone's Text Size setting)
◆ Clear Password History option
◆ Bug fixes

◆ Custom icons support
◆ Bug fixes

◆ One-time passwords (TOTP) support
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ One-time passwords (TOTP) support
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

version_description:

◆ Bug fixes

◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ Bug fixes on iOS 11
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ Login with Face ID
◆ Label: Pin to top
◆ Label: Color
◆ Preferences: Card's subtitle (Labels or Login)
◆ Preferences: Hide passwords
◆ Card: Highlighted digits in passwords
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ Face ID support
◆ Restore default templates
◆ Localization updates
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ Warning of expiring cards
◆ New labels: Expiring, Expired
◆ New field type: Expiry
◆ New symbols: RuPay, rupee
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ Warning of expiring cards
◆ New labels: Expiring, Expired
◆ New field type: Expiry
◆ New symbols: RuPay, rupee
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.

◆ Global search option (enabled by default)
◆ Require password every 5 days to prevent forgetting it while using Touch ID/Face ID login (can be disabled)
◆ Use Google's favicon service for getting website icons
◆ One-time password autofill in a built-in browser
◆ Bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.
